formElement.documentation: ID of the existing work item query. You should copy this from the query page. Either this or the Query Text should be specified. Example: '4dffc10d-a10a-4e9e-9172-391a81ef8a9b'
formElement.htmlDocumentation: ID of the existing work item query. You should copy this from the query page. Example: '4dffc10d-a10a-4e9e-9172-391a81ef8a9b'
formElement.label: Query ID:

formElement.documentation: The WIQL query string to run. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/boards/queries/wiql-syntax?view=vsts for the details. Either this or Query ID should be specified.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Query string in WIQL. Either this or Query ID should be specified.
formElement.label: Query Text:
Metadata property path:
formElement.documentation: Property sheet where run metadata will be stored. Optional field. If omitted, /mySchedule/@PLUGIN_KEY@-%JobName%-%Report Object Type% will be used for schedule contest. For all other contexts root is /myProject.

formElement.label: Preview:
formElement.documentation: If checked, no data will be sent to the reporting system. Use this option to preview gathered data.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: If checked, no data will be sent to the reporting system. Use this option to preview gathered data.

formElement.label: Debug:
formElement.documentation: If checked, the debug level will be set to "Debug".
